ygData.messageBody:
Shando,

Fairness? hmmm I heard of that concept somewhere before. Not that you will
ever see somthing like that in a MMORGP. Tell, shout, groupsay and guildsay
are forms of communication that are integral part of a game such as this.
This is a social game and if you couldn't communicate with friends and
guildmates etc by these meanspeople just wouldn't play. If you take out the
social interaction you dont have a customer base if they dont have a
customer base you dont have a game.


Fairness and Reality are not somthing that belong in a fantasy setting IMO

Kizmet Bayashi
Monk of the 46th .....
E-marr
Da`Kor
